decisions.title: Token tracking system design for memory management
decisions.context: Need to track memory usage to know when cleanup is needed and understand which agents/skills generate most content
decisions.decision: Implement 3-tier token tracking: entry-level (per item), file-level (per category), and global stats (memory-stats.json). Track agent attribution and skill usage. Use 4-char-per-token estimation. Focus on cleanup decisions, skip conversation tracking.

positive: Know when to cleanup old memory

alternatives: Exact token counting via API (rejected: too expensive)

_comments.dateFormat: Use ISO 8601 format with timezone for timestamps: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS-05:00
_comments.note: Dashboard will display date and time when timestamp includes 'T', otherwise only date
